text:
ASL Vision - Lewes (Near Brighton), UK.

If you love machine vision and want to work on autonomous vehicles, you should come and work for us.

We are looking for C & C++ developers, embedded software engineers and algorithms engineers with machine vision experience.

We are a small team of friendly and talented engineers, so we have a lean & mean startup vibe, but big-company backing.

Our project and products are growing mile-long legs, and we could do with a hand scaling-out our team, our infrastructure, and our product.

You should come along for the ride: It's gonna be fun!
